google_play_reviews.content: Needs to support passphrases being entered on the external hardware device
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hey! This is already supported! Get in touch with our help desk if you have doubts https://help.blockstream.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=8613

google_play_reviews.content: One of the best Bitcoin wallets on the market. Can't wait for it to support lightning soon!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your review!

google_play_reviews.content: Works great!
Top wallet been using it for a while, great for newbies, It only lacks lightning support which I hope it will be implemented soon
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Yes! Lightning is coming in 2023!

google_play_reviews.content: Keep saying insufficient funds when using bip39 account, what the... Edit: I read the help article, I'm trying to send less than I have, still the same error... Only happens on the bip39 account. Edit2: why would I be wasting my time writing a review I'm not sure about if I'm not doing it right, I'm trying to send 30$ when I have 50$ in my account, the fee sure isn't 20$... Edit: never got a response back
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hello - Please review the guide here to learn about what causes this error message and how to fix it: https://help.blockstream.com/hc/en-us/articles/900003013723-Why-am-I-receiving-an-insufficient-funds-error-

Please reach out on help.blockstream.com so we can investigate this further.

google_play_reviews.content: Be careful this app wallet is not safe. My Seed Phase got compromised.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we are sorry to hear you had issues with the wallet. Storing your seed phrase safely outside of the wallet is your responsibility. The app uses strong encryption techniques to keep it safe, but you also have to store it safely outside the app away from compromised devices.

google_play_reviews.content: The confirmation dialog on my Android device Galaxy S21 was difficult to use as the numbers on the number pad are outside of the window area. It was difficult to enter the confirmation code. Also, the confirmation dialog floats on top of all of the windows, so going to your email is difficult.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for reporting, we're looking into it, we'll update you when we deploy a fix for you

google_play_reviews.content: Worked well so far but I'm 1 failed password away from getting locked out! Does the 3 attempts reset after a certain time? I'm 99% sure I have the right code now...but if I dont...
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello - The attempts do not reset, but if you forgot your PIN you can always restore your wallet using your 12 or 24 word recovery phrase if you have it backed up and written down correctly.

google_play_reviews.content: In this context, I love being Green. The products, services, and customer service are all top notch.
Needs a little more polish but OK👍
simple to use and safe
great wallet nice interface good
great wallet. works well for me
Not connecting to Bluetooth on last pin attempts
dbest
Genuine Bitcoin only wallet.
Excellent wallet for bitcoin and liquid
Excellent wallet app. no problems and easy to use.
Support Multisig for other Hardware sign devices Coldcard, bitbox, Foundation...
Best bitcoin only wallet as sends from unique address each time, same for receive. This makes transactions less traceable.
This is so great it really helps to adjust fees and share your funds at a lower fees.
I'm getting a timeout error while trying to log in to my wallet. Ok now it works, but in opinion the servers are down too often.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello - This was likely due to planned maintenance that we had previously announced. Please try logging in again and apologies for the inconvenience.

google_play_reviews.content: Used to work great, sure it takes a little longer to send or recieve crypto even if you pay but not a bad wallet that was until they put together some update and now I can't send crypto I try to slide to confirm the transaction and all it does is give me an error code pretty damn frustrating and it makes the wallet completely pointless.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hello - Apologies for the inconvenience. Would you mind reaching out on help.blockstream.com (if you haven't already) so we can investigate your issue further?

Update: If you were receiving an rpc error, please update to version 3.8.4 to resolve this issue.

google_play_reviews.content: Seems nice, works well with Trezor. One star down for not implementing watch only wallets and for defaulting to legacy addresses.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello - Thanks for your feedback. Watch only wallets are available in Multisig Shield wallets but will be coming to Singlesig wallets soon.

google_play_reviews.content: Would have given 5 stars but transactions especially withdrawals take too long even after paying extra fees for "30" minute processing still took almost 6 hours. Other than that good app
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello - Thanks for your feedback. Please note that Blockstream does not control how fast your transaction is confirmed and our fee estimates in the app are simply estimates. More traffic on the blockchain can drastically slow your transaction, even when paying a high fee. Please let us know if you have any further questions about this.

google_play_reviews.content: The most secure and stable wallet
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback!

google_play_reviews.content: Practice restoring my wallet. Works perfect. 100% trust. Love it
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello - Would you mind reaching out on help.blockstream.com so we can collect more information about your issue?

google_play_reviews.content: Worked fine until last update, now I can't get in with any of my credentials. Contacted help multiple times, no response.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello - Would you mind providing a ticket number? It doesn't look like we have any open tickets with this issue. If you have not submitted a ticket, please open one on help.blockstream.com and reference this message so we can collect more information.

google_play_reviews.content: this app says my phrase is valid but cant find my wallet. is the service down or something? im on the right network
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello - Would you mind trying again and let us know if you still have this issue? Feel free to reach out on help.blockstream.com if you need further assistance.

google_play_reviews.content: I love it. Clean easy. Maybe the best of the rest.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback!

google_play_reviews.content: A+
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback!

google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello - If you are having any trouble with Blockstream Green, feel free to reach out on help.blockstream.com so we can provide assistance.

google_play_reviews.content: do i have to move my bitcoin to the blockchain version of this app? i keep getting messages about old greenhouse interfaces will be unsupported.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello - The notification you are referring to is an old message that is appearing due to the new UI. Since you are already using the latest version of Green, there is nothing further you need to do. Please reach out on help.blockstream.com if you have any further questions.

google_play_reviews.content: can't enter recovery phrase because this garbage app doesn't recognise words like facet and it only lets you type face
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello - The word "facet" is not a valid word based on the BIP39 wordlist, which you can view here: https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0039/english.txt. It appears that you may have written a word down incorrectly, so you may want to look over this list for a word that is similar to "facet" in order to restore your wallet

google_play_reviews.content: Error: Login Failed - (this happened after typing correctly my phrase) - - - - - - - Update: everything is working perfect no issues, I really love your app. Thank you so much
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello - This error means your recovery phrase does not match a wallet on our servers or is being restored on the wrong network. Would you mind reaching out on help.blockstream.com so we can assist you further?

google_play_reviews.content: After an update on my new phone and using recovery, my wallet is showing "ZERO VALUE " no btc. That's Wrong!.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello - You have likely just selected the wrong security policy when restoring. Please review the note under step 3: https://help.blockstream.com/hc/en-us/articles/900001382663-How-do-I-restore-a-Blockstream-Green-wallet-. Feel free to reach out on help.blockstream.com if you have any further questions.

google_play_reviews.content: My prime wallet, I haven't found any problems so far, most of the bad reviews are from people that don't know how to use the wallet.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello - Thanks for your feedback!

google_play_reviews.content: This app was okay at first but for the last several months I cannot send by bitcoin to any other address. At first it would just say invalid address and nor it says internal error. Always something new it seems....it sure never gives me a problem when accepting transactions. I would like to send my bitcoin...what is the problem?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello - The "invalid address" error occurs when trying to send to an address for a different network than your wallet. Please reach out on help.blockstream.com if you need any further assistance or explanation.

google_play_reviews.content: Lost access to my wallet , I could not remember the words since I update the app from 5 years The probelm at that time , the did not confirm with that I memorized it or keep it , I thought I. Could recover throught mail
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello - The recovery phrase is the most important thing to keep backed up and protected. Sorry to hear about this but please reach out on help.blockstream.com if you have any further questions.

google_play_reviews.content: When I transfer my Btc to another wallet it shows invalid address always.even not transfered to another green wallet or trust wallet .plz fix the issue or provide guideline to operate .
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, the "invalid address" error means you are trying to send to an address on a different network than your wallet. This usually happens when users are using a testnet bitcoin wallet, but try to send to a mainnet wallet. Please reach out on help.blockstream.com if you have further questions.

google_play_reviews.content: Why cant i withdraw my funds? The ADD AMOUNT option is unclickable ? Have neen trying since early morning yet nothing happens
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, would you mind reaching out on help.blockstream.com so we can investigate this issue further?

google_play_reviews.content: I want to send BTC from the wallet but always says invalid address. I'm not available to withdraw my BTC to any other address. Do you know what is going on?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, the "invalid address" error means you are trying to send to an address on a different network than your wallet. This usually happens when users are using a testnet bitcoin wallet, but try to send to a mainnet wallet. Please reach out on help.blockstream.com if you have further questions.

google_play_reviews.content: I'm new to this. I have an open wallet and I got bitcoins on it. Why can't I send them on?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, this usually happens when users are using a testnet bitcoin wallet, but try to send to a mainnet wallet. Would you mind submitting a ticket on help.blockstream.com so we can assist you further?

google_play_reviews.content: I been trying to login into my wallet for the past 24 hours but it's been futile no matter what I try. It keeps saying connection failed. I thought it was my internet service but there's absolutely nothing wrong with my connection. And I can't find away to contact support for this.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, this issue has been identified and fixed. Please update to version 3.7.3 to access your wallet, and apologies for the inconvenience.

google_play_reviews.content: Every time I open the app after months, there's always something else. I've had this since the beginning of discovering Bitcoin, but it might be time to change. I'm being told I used an incorrect pin too many times, but all I did was use the biometric entry. Sure, losing thousands of dollars will end up being my fault for not writing down a ridiculously long recovery phrase from 15 years ago, but I figured I could rely on the integrity of the app, since they deal with such a sector. Stay away.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, the recovery phrase essentially is your wallet and it is imperative to keep it backed up and protected. This is not unique to Blockstream Green but is the same for almost all bitcoin wallets. https://help.blockstream.com/hc/en-us/articles/900001392563-What-is-a-recovery-phrase-

google_play_reviews.content: Says connection failed when I'm trying to access my wallet. Whats going on, please help
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we apologize for the service disruption, the fix for your issue is available with the latest version, please update to version 3.7.3.

google_play_reviews.content: Why do I need a qr code to take my funds out why can't I just transfer my bitcoin to another wallet like coin base
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, there is no need for a QR code to send bitcoin from Green. Simply enter the destination address, enter the amount, and your bitcoin will be sent. If you need any assistance with the sending process, please open a ticket on help.blockstream.com.

google_play_reviews.content: . Download It! ... #CryptoRevolution ... [;)]
I couldn't open my wallet as it states invalid connection in both of my android app and windows app. Tried to restore with phrase with no result. Need help.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we recently experienced a temporary outage but the service should be back online. We apologize for the inconvenience.

google_play_reviews.content: 1 star currently but admittedly only just downloaded. I transferred myself some btc from an exchange and then uninstalled the app to test the recovery process. On entering the first 3 secret words there is no 'next option' or prompt to type in the remaining secret words. Instead you just have to start typing for the 4th 5th and 6th secret word boxes to appear. Fright of my life thinking I cant get my btc back. Hopefully the team can update that to make user experience a bit friendlier
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thanks for this information. We are currently working on improving the recovery phrase input so it is more obvious where the remaining words need to be entered.

google_play_reviews.content: Done

This is beyond totally usless ! You have the damned green next button covering the last words ; word 6 blocked just as 12 and all the last words are friggin blocked, morans. At least make the damn screen scrollable, or make the damn button transparent......pitiful
They fixed my issues. Good customer support. Happy to get my wallet back!! Excellent app
Loving the app so far, but please add a batch spend feature and CPFP feature as well.. Thanks in advance
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for your feedback. At present, you cannot delete accounts. It's impossible to stop funds from being sent to an account once it has been created, so deleting an account may needlessly prevent a user from accessing funds that may end up there. You can, however, rename the accounts from the desktop client.

Great wallet app, I would like a exchange rate on the main screen, if that was added would rate 5 stars
Really secure wallet. One missing thing I would like to see is actual price tracking like graphs or even just the current price displayed.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback!

Great wallet

google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello Nariman. Sorry to hear your experience hasn't been great. If you are still having trouble receiving SMS messages, please open an issue with our support desktop by clicking "contact support" on our Help Center: help.blockstream.com

google_play_reviews.content: The UI is simple, intuitive and flashy too. I have been using greenaddress for the last 3 years and Green is a better/simpler version of it. I like that this supports advance but necessary features like transaction fee bumping.

Hello please allow me to make 3 suggestions only 1. Add KES currency option Kenyan shilling (maybe from Localbitcoins KES exchange rate) so we can view balance in local currency 2. Add Push notifications for transactions even when green wallet app is closed just like bitcoin(dot) com wallet exactly. We really need notifications for monitoring purposes to know when we receive bitcoin payments 3. Fingerprint to confirm/ authorize transactions just like in banking apps (or for spending limit)
I have lost my old phone, because of Google authorisation I can't use my bitcoin on my new phone
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Vinicius. If you have access to your mnemonic, you can always access your funds, though there may be a waiting period. Check out this article for what to do if you've lost all your two-factor authentication methods:

https://help.blockstream.com/hc/en-us/articles/900001536126-I-ve-lost-access-to-my-2FA-how-do-I-access-my-funds-

google_play_reviews.content: It works now :)
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. If you haven't tried again with our latest version, please do so. If you're still having trouble then, please email us at info@greenaddress.it and include relevant details such as your operating system, app version number, and any error message you receive.

google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello Ancient Drip Knight. Thank you for the feedback. If you would like to share anything specific you've been having trouble with, we would be more than happy to take it under consideration - we are continuously working to improve the user interface. You can let us know here, or feel free to email us at support(at)blockstream(dot)com

google_play_reviews.content: suppport took 6 days to answer my email!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello Angela. Apologies for the late reply. In the past month we experienced and unusually high support load and it took us some time to work through the backlog. We have made adjustments to our support system to compensate for this, and you can expect faster response times moving forward. Thank you for understanding.
